sentences.en: He was sent away to school to wean him from bad companions.
sentences.cn: 送他上学,以便与坏的伙伴断绝来往.

sentences.en: I know we need to wean you from Harvard in a figurative sense.
sentences.cn: 虽然我们会把你们比作已经从哈佛断奶的孩子们,但我从没想到会这么彻底.

sentences.en: It's two years since I've seen Iain. I'm still trying to wean myself off him but it's hard.
sentences.cn: 我已有两年没见过伊恩了。我试图让自己不再去想他，可很难做到。

sentences.en: Often she tried, as gently wean him from this fanatic worship of the Muses.
sentences.cn: 她常常尽量委婉地劝他别这样狂热地崇拜缪斯女神.

sentences.en: One kind of operation is called a farrow - to - wean farm.
sentences.cn: 有一种养殖方式叫从产崽到断奶养殖场.

sentences.en: Part of you will still want that cigarette, so wean yourself off them gradually.
sentences.cn: 你还会有点想要香烟, 所以要让自己逐渐戒掉.

sentences.en: She tried to wean him away from football.
sentences.cn: 她要他以后不要再踢足球了.

sentences.en: She tried to wean him from playing football.
sentences.cn: 她试图让他不再踢足球.

sentences.en: Tess was trying to wean herself from the old life.
sentences.cn: 泰丝那时正努力使自己摆脱过去的生活.

sentences.en: The boy is wean at six month because his mother have to go to work.
sentences.cn: 这小男孩六个月就断奶了,因为他妈妈要上班.

sentences.en: The hospital managed to wean her off the drug.
sentences.cn: 医院已让她逐步减少依赖这种药.

sentences.en: The patch enables smokers to wean themselves off cigarettes very gradually.
sentences.cn: 这张贴片能使吸烟者很缓慢地把烟戒掉.

sentences.en: Tom was sent away to school to wean him from bad companions.
sentences.cn: 汤姆被送去上学,以使他和坏伙伴断绝来往.

sentences.en: When would be the best time to start weaning my baby?
sentences.cn: 什么时候开始给我的孩子断奶最好呢？

sentences.en: You are given pills with small quantities of nicotine to wean you from cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 会给你一些含少量尼古丁的药片帮你戒除烟瘾。

sentences.en: You know him personally , you wean?
sentences.cn: 你的意思是你本人就认识他?
